metadata.synopsis: Cal's dialog after the three-way dialog with his brother and sister during the camp celebration. Cal is usually the peacekeeper of the group and is enjoying this rare moment of peace and quiet in his family. He is sitting down.

0.speaker: Cal
0.text: Are Rolan and Lia actually getting along? I know you cut down a horde of goblins, but is far more impressive.
0.context: NodeContext: Joking around but secretly pleased the night is going so well

2.speaker: Cal
2.text: Elturel was the last time the three of us talked like this. Let's hope it lasts until Baldur's Gate.
